comment._content: B-59: Thank you for providing the background on Sanger as well as the reason she might have been in the news at the time. We will add some details to this record as well as to the other photos of Sanger in Flickr.

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: An account (with photo) of her appearance in Federal Court in New York for her trial, at which she was to represent herself, ran in the New York Press, 1/19/1916. fultonhistory.com/Newspaper%2018/New%20York%20NY%20Press/... see also
